plot: After suffering paralysis due to a car accident, a young man informs his two best friends that he wants them to take him on a road trip and at the end of it, kill him.
title: Losing Will
plot_es: After suffering paralysis due to a car accident, a young man informs his two best friends that he wants them to take him on a road trip and at the end of it, kill him.
plot_en: After suffering paralysis due to a car accident, a young man informs his two best friends that he wants them to take him on a road trip and at the end of it, kill him.
